response.overview: A single mother, plagued by the violent death of her husband, battles with her son's fear of a monster lurking in the house, but soon discovers a sinister presence all around her.
response.tagline: If it's in a word, or it's in a look, you can't get rid of... the Babadook.
response.title: The Babadook
